defaultMessage: We are the {crslr} at the University of Kiel in Germany and this project is funded by the {future_ocean}.
Nassos is the group leader and a professor at the University of Kiel. He's Greek, has two little boys and his desk looks like hell.

Claudia is a Doctoral Researcher and the rising star who will turn your images into something meaningful. She's a charming tough questioner and eager to learn for herself. She's also always the first to laugh.
That's me. I created this website ... so I'm responsible for all the typos!
For translating this site into Spanish
